page.title: 04TANG HALL
page.content: Tang Hall is a home for the elderly. Before it was this it was a blind home.These people started the buisness 9 months ago.In Tang Hall their are 12 old people.The oldest person is 85 and the youngest person is 60.Most of the people come from London and East Anglia.Mr Leivesley has 8 people working for him,and they come to work at 8.00 in the morning.He does all the decorating and the gardening and it looks very nice from the outside.There are 9 bedrooms but some people share because the bedrooms are very big.They also take the people for rides in the van and the workers take them for daily walks.
